episodes.title: BruCast #100 - Andrew-Ryan Profaci
episodes.description:
Andrew-Ryan Profaci survived a year inside the infamous Love Has Won cult as “Father God.” He exposes the cult’s darkest secrets and teaches how to break free from manipulation, trauma, and impossible odds.
https://thewaronlove.com/

OUTLINE
0:00 Introduction & Sponsor Mentions
3:04 How Conspiracy Theories Led Andrew Into A CULT
13:30 How Amy Manipulated People Into Worshipping “Father God”
20:48 Andrew’s Shocking SUPERNATURAL Encounters
34:10 The ALIEN Hoax Inside The Cult
44:00 Meeting “Mother God” Amy Carlson — CRAZIEST Moment
49:00 When Andrew Finally Broke FREE From The Cult
1:02:20 The Truth Behind The Taj Mahal
1:09:10 Andrew Confronts Amy On Her DELUSION
1:17:50 The BLUE Mummy Wrapped In Christmas Lights
01:24:00 Final Remarks
